item.title: [Python] Features of pd.NA in pandas 1.0.0 (rc0)
item.description: update1 2020-01-25: Added that bug-like behavior was bug As of 2020-01-13, pandas 1.0.0rc0 has been released, but one of the major features is that pd.NA is introduced as a missing value. Summarize this property and usage. Disclaimer: pandas 1.0.0 It is a confirmed operation with rc0, and there is a good possibility of change in the future. Verification environment is the last. wrap up pd.NA appears as the meaning of missing value.
